ai_insights.crash_analysis:
• USD/JPY at 156.14 (HIGH STRESS) shows extreme currency stress, historically correlated with financial instability when above 150
  • MOVE Index proxy at 45 (RISING STRESS) indicates growing bond market volatility, though still below panic levels (50+ is critical)
  • Conflicting signals: Stable oil prices (“Oil Prices Stable” headline) and strong tech performance (“Meta/Microsoft weekly gains”) offset some stress, but don’t address structural USD/JPY risks
  • Trigger watch: USD/JPY breaking 158 could force BOJ intervention, sparking liquidity crisis | Timeline: 3-6 months if yen weakness accelerates

Overall crash probability: CLOSE (55%) - Critical pressure points exist but not yet systemic.
ai_insights.news_summary:
• 1. "Goldman: Profit/Dividend Growth to Drive Stocks in 2026" - Contradicts crash fears with long-term bullish outlook, reducing immediate panic risk
  • 2. "Oil Prices Stable” - Indicates no commodity shock currently amplifying market stress
  • 3. “Meta/Microsoft largest weekly gains since May” - Tech resilience may temporarily mask broader financial system stress (USD/JPY)
